CODIF_DATA.TY_TYPE_BID: Submission for one or more lots

ML_TI_DOC.TI_CY: Dik li kienet ir-Repubblika Jugoslava tal-Maċedonja

LOCATION.P: Agency for Electronic Communications, Kej Dimitar Vlahov 21 Skopje

F02_ANNEX_B.LOT_TITLE: Insuring AEC’s property against fire and other hazards, insurance of equipment against breaking and other hazards, glass against breaking, personal computers and processors, burglaries and robberies
Casco insurance of motor vehicles owned by AEC without franchise (including risk of theft, unlawful repossession of the vehicles and robbery in all European countries

DEPOSITS_GUARANTEES_REQUIRED.P: The selected most favorable bidder shall be obliged to provide performance guarantee in the amount of 10 % of the contract value, including VAT

ECONOMIC_OPERATORS_PERSONAL_SITUATION.P: — Statement of the economic operator that, within the last five years, he/she has not had any legally effective judgment for participation in a criminal organization, corruption, fraud or money laundering, pronounced against him/her;
— Confirmation that he/she is not subject to a bankruptcy procedure opened by a competent authority;
— Confirmation that he/she is not subject to a liquidation procedure opened by a competent authority;
— Confirmation of paid taxes, contributions and other public dues issued by a competent authority in the country where the economic operator is registered;

— Confirmation from the Registry of Offences for Committed Crimes by Legal Persons that a secondary sentence for prohibition of participation on public bidding procedures or awarding of public procurement or public private partnerships contracts has not been issued against him/her;

— Confirmation from the Registry of Offences for Committed Crimes by Legal Persons, that a secondary sentence for provisional or permanent prohibition to execute a specific business activity has not been issued against him/her;

— Confirmation that there is no legally effective judgment imposing a misdemeanour sanction involving prohibition to perform a profession, activity or duty, or prohibition to perform a specific activity, imposed against him/her.
— License to operate from the Insurance Supervision Agency.
— Current Status issued by the Central Registry of Republic of Macedonia.

EAF_CAPACITY_INFORMATION.P: — Excerpt from a bank, not older than 30 days from the date of bid submission,

— Report on the Balance Sheet verified by a competent authority, that is to say, audited Balance Sheet or excerpts from the Balance Sheet in cases where publication of the Balance Sheet is prescribed by law in the country where the Economic Operator is registered,

— Excerpt for the overall turnover of the undertaking (data from the Balance Sheet issued by a competent authority, that is to say, audited Income Statement) and, where appropriate, for the turnover in the area covered by the public procurement contract, for two financial years (2015 and 2016) for which such information is available, depending on the date when the undertaking was registered or commenced operations, and depending on the availability of such information,
— Statement of the responsible person of the Bidder that it is has acquired the minimum gross written premium for the year 1.1.2016 to 31.12.2016.

EAF_CAPACITY_MIN_LEVEL.P: — Minimum gross written premium for the year 1.1.2016 to 31.12.2016 – 700 000,00 MKD,
— Positive financial report for financial years 2015 and 2016.

T_CAPACITY_INFORMATION.P: — Reinsurance Programme of at least A- as per the rating of the first reinsurer of the Standard and Poor’s Rating,
— Statement of the responsible person of the Bidder that it has at least three-year experience in property insurance,

— Photocopy of the least 3 (three) signed contracts by the Bidder for property insurance of legal persons, at annual level, for the last three years, with individual value of each contract of at least 20 000 EUR,
— Photocopy of signed at least 5 (five) contracts for contracted damage claims assessors,

— Statement of the responsible person of the Bidder that it has contracted technical staff, who will be in charge of executing the procurement subject matter (incl. the names and surnames of said technical staff).

T_CAPACITY_MIN_LEVEL.P: — Reinsurance coverage from a reinsurance undertaking with at least A- credit rating established as per the Standard and Poor’s Rating,
— At least 3-year experience in property insurance,
— At least 3 (three) signed contracts by the Bidder for property insurance of legal persons, at annual level, for the last three years, with individual value of each contract of at least 20 000 EUR,
— At least 5 (five) contracted damage claims assessors,
— Contracted technical staff, who will be in charge of executing the procurement subject matter.

EXECUTION_SERVICE_RESERVED_PARTICULAR_PR.P: License to operate from the Insurance Supervision Agency

USE_ELECTRONIC_AUCTION.P: To participate in the electronic auction you need to register with ESPP.More detailed information on the electronic auction: The Procuring Entity shall use the electronic auction as the last stage of the open procedure.
The subject of the electronic auction shall be the total price, including all expenses and discounts, without VAT.

The starting price shall be the lowest price among the accepted tenders submitted in the initial stage of the procedure. The invitations to Tender shall be submitted electronically via ESPP, following the complete evaluation of the initial tenders, to all Economic Operators that submitted acceptable tenders in the first stage of the procedure and that registered with ESPP.

ADDITIONAL_INFORMATION.P: The tender documetation must be downloaded from www.e-nabavki.gov.mk
